title: Muhammad (pbuh) is a Universal Messenger - Shaikh Fariq Naik
transcript: the topic of this evening's talk of mine is Prophet Muhammad peace be upon him the Liberator of humanity I started my talk with the quotation from the Glorious Quran from Surah Ambia chapter 21 verse number 107. that we have sent thee not but as a mercy to all the worlds as a mercy to all the creatures as a mercy to the whole of humanity that we have send thee not but as a universal messenger giving Glad Tidings and warning men against sin but most of them did not understand since Prophet Muhammad peace be upon him he was the last and final messenger he was not sent only for the Muslims or only for the Arabs but Prophet Muhammad peace be upon him he was sent for the entire Humanity and I would like to share with you an incident of suhail Bin um he was sent by the quresh to negotiate with the prophet salallahu alaihi wasallam before the Treaty of udaibia now he was an international negotiator he had been to the Roman Empire he had been to the Persian Empire he had been to abyssinia and he had a first-hand experience of how the sahaba dealt with the prophet salallahu alaihi wasallam now when he returns back to the quresh he tells them that I have seen the Roman Empire I have seen the Persian Empire I have seen the Empire of abyssinia but I have not seen any followers love and respect their leader so much the way the sahaba love and respect the prophet Muhammad peace be upon him being a non-muslim he was shocked and impressed with how the sahaba dealt with the prophet Muhammad peace be upon him
